name: to3d
author: AFNI Developers
description: Creates 3D datasets for use with AFNI from 2D image files

inputs.description: Input 2D image files
inputs.name: Input Files

inputs.description: Declare images to contain data of a given type
inputs.name: Image Type

inputs.description: Supply auxiliary statistical parameters
inputs.name: Statistical Parameters

inputs.description: Prefix of the output 3D dataset
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Session directory for output 3D dataset
inputs.name: Output Session

inputs.description: Read geometry data from dataset file
inputs.name: Geometry Parent File

inputs.description: Take anatomy parent from dataset file
inputs.name: Anatomy Parent File

inputs.description: Suppress autosave of 3D dataset
inputs.name: No Save Flag

inputs.description: Suppress saving of the BRIK file
inputs.name: No Write BRIK Flag

inputs.description: Set the dataset's viewing coordinates
inputs.name: View Type

inputs.description: Specify time dependent dataset (z-axis first, then t-axis)
inputs.name: Time Dependent Data (zt)

inputs.description: Specify time dependent dataset (t-axis first, then z-axis)
inputs.name: Time Dependent Data (tz)

inputs.description: Specify TR units
inputs.name: TR Units

inputs.description: Set time origin of dataset
inputs.name: Time Origin

inputs.description: Specify size and orientation of the x-axis extent
inputs.name: X-Axis FOV

inputs.description: Specify size and orientation of the y-axis extent
inputs.name: Y-Axis FOV

inputs.description: Specify size and orientation of the z-axis extent
inputs.name: Z-Axis FOV

inputs.description: Specify x-axis slab
inputs.name: X-Axis Slab

inputs.description: Specify y-axis slab
inputs.name: Y-Axis Slab

inputs.description: Specify z-axis slab
inputs.name: Z-Axis Slab

inputs.description: Set the center of the first slice offset in z-axis
inputs.name: Z-Origin

inputs.description: Set voxel data to be stored as given data type
inputs.name: Data Type

inputs.description: Global scaling factor
inputs.name: Global Scaling Factor

inputs.description: Do not scan for illegal floating point values
inputs.name: No Float Scan Flag

inputs.description: Read and process images one slice at a time
inputs.name: In 1 Flag

inputs.description: Set the orientation of the 3D volumes
inputs.name: Orientation Code

inputs.description: Skip the outlier check for 3D+time datasets
inputs.name: Skip Outliers Flag

inputs.description: Only print out the outlier check results in text form
inputs.name: Text Outliers Flag

inputs.description: Save the outliers count into a 1D file
inputs.name: Save Outliers File

inputs.description: Assume any Siemens DICOM file is a potential MOSAIC image
inputs.name: Assume DICOM Mosaic Flag

inputs.description: Assume origin and orientation from oblique transformation matrix
inputs.name: Oblique Origin Flag

inputs.description: Reverse the input file list
inputs.name: Reverse List Flag

inputs.description: Search DICOM images for the last occurrence of each element
inputs.name: Use Last Element Flag

inputs.description: Do not use the Dec 2010 updates to Siemens mosaic code
inputs.name: Use Old Mosaic Code Flag

inputs.description: Convert input shorts to float and add 2^16 to any negatives
inputs.name: Ushort2Float Flag

inputs.description: Show debugging information for reading DICOM files
inputs.name: Verbose Flag

inputs.description: Gamma correction factor for the monitor
inputs.name: Gamma Correction

inputs.description: Number of gray levels for the image displays
inputs.name: Number of Colors

inputs.description: Turn on display of Xt warning messages
inputs.name: XT Warns Flag

inputs.description: Do not launch interactive to3d mode if input has error
inputs.name: Quit on Error Flag
